name: bianca-app-backend
description: A Tele-Health application that performs wellness checks for the elderly and disabled.
author: Jordan Lapp <negascout@gmail.com>

scripts.terraform:command: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest
scripts.terraform:destroy: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest destroy --auto-approve
scripts.terraform:taint: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest taint --auto-approve
scripts.terraform:init: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest init
scripts.terraform:plan: docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest plan -no-color -input=false
scripts.terraform:apply: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest apply --auto-approve
scripts.terraform:deploy: yarn terraform:init && yarn terraform:plan && yarn terraform:apply
scripts.terraform:refresh: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest refresh --auto-approve
scripts.terraform:import: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest import
scripts.terraform:state: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest state
scripts.terraform:output: docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/app" -v "/home/jordanlapp/.aws:/root/.aws" -w /app/devops/terraform -e AWS_PROFILE=jordan -e AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-2 hashicorp/terraform:latest output
